name: Formatter
author: bitst0rm-pub
description: 🌶 A Sublime Text 3 & 4 plugin to beautify and minify source code: CSS, SCSS, Sass, Less, HTML, XML, SVG, JavaScript, JSON, GraphQL, Markdown, TypeScript, Vue, YAML, Go, Perl, PHP, Python, Ruby, Rust, Haskell, Dart, Swift, Crystal, Bash, Shell, SQL, CSV, TSV, C, C++, C#, Objective-C, D, Java, Pawn, VALA, Proto, LaTeX, D2, Mermaid, PlantUML, etc.
